home-about.title: Logistics for Enterprises
home-about.sub-title: Vietnam Post Logistics is proud to be a comprehensive logistics ecosystem for businesses.
home-about.content: Vietnam Post Logistics is trusted and chosen by many leading domestic and international corporations thanks to its outstanding competitive advantages. Not only a state-owned enterprise with a prestigious national brand, at Vietnam Post Logistics, we have a team of highly qualified, young, professional, dedicated, and responsible staff. We also own an extensive network of bonded warehouses and distribution centers across the country.

solution.title: Comprehensive Solutions
solution.content: As one of the leading logistics companies in Vietnam today, we always focus on professionalism, speed, and convenience, in order to provide our customers with the highest quality services. Vietnam Post Logistics has been and is bringing a logistics ecosystem that includes 5 comprehensive solutions for customers ranging from domestic to international, and from B2B to B2C.

slides.slide_1_desc: Efficient warehouse & contract logistics solutions for optimal storage.
slides.slide_2_desc: Providing comprehensive logistics solutions from air, sea, railway, cross-border trucking & more...
slides.slide_3_desc: Accompanying sellers who want to conquer the international e-commerce market
slides.slide_4_desc: Demonstrate responsibility, ensure accurate and correct delivery.
slides.slide_5_desc: Comprehensive import-export solutions to streamline your global trade.

why_choose_us.reason_1_description: Inheriting the prestigious national brand of Vietnam Post Corporation, Vietnam Post Logistics deserves to be a reliable companion of every customer.
why_choose_us.reason_2_description: Vietnam Post Logistics owns a team of elite, professional and dedicated human resources, always ready to serve and answer all needs of customers and partners 24/7.
why_choose_us.reason_3_description: Vietnam Post Logistics provides a comprehensive Logistics ecosystem including: Warehousing, International Logistics, International E-commerce, Domestic Logistics and Import-Export.
why_choose_us.reason_4_description: With a network covering and spanning 230 countries and territories, we are committed to providing fast and flexible shipping solutions to customers.
why_choose_us.reason_5_description: At Vietnam Post Logistics, customers can experience a variety of Logistics services, thereby helping you optimize costs and choose the most suitable solutions for your business.
why_choose_us.reason_6_description: At Vietnam Post Logisitcs, we comply with standards and regulations on customer and goods information security, ensuring trust and peace of mind for service users.

about-quote.content: At Vietnam Post Logistics, we are committed to delivering reliable, fast, and innovative logistics solutions that meet the diverse needs of our customers. Guided by trust, efficiency, and sustainability, we aim to connect communities and businesses across Vietnam and globally.

about-container.vision-des: To become the leading logistics & supply chain solution provider connecting Vietnam with the world, empowering businesses and consumers through seamless, innovative and sustanable logistics solutions
about-container.mission-des: Our mission is to seamlessly connect businesses and individuals across Vietnam with the world. We are committed to driving growth by providing innovative, reliable, and efficient logistics solutions that foster global trade and communication. With a focus on customer satisfaction, sustainable practices, and advanced technologies, we aim to bridge distances, empower communities, and become a trusted partner in the global supply chain. Together, we deliver opportunities, strengthen connections, and unlock new possibilities for Vietnam and beyond.
about-container.core-value-des: reflect its commitment to delivering quality and reliability in logistics services. These values are encapsulated by the principles of challenge, commitment, integrity, responsibility, and respect. The company emphasizes continuous improvement and strives to connect people and businesses through efficient logistics solutions. With these values, Vietnam Post Logistics aims to become a leading logistics provider in Vietnam, leveraging its vast network and infrastructure to offer comprehensive supply chain solutions.

e-commerce.53: Always grasp detailed goods status, easy communication

rail.title: Global Logistics
rail.item4: Security and safety are always our top priority.
rail.main-des: Vietnam Post Logistics is providing freight transportation solutions via the railway system by the North South, as well as interna-tional railway routes. We handle the transporta-tion of various types of goods with a wide range of flexible services for our customers.
rail.advantages1: Minimizing environmental impact through rail energy efficiency.
rail.advantages2: Ability to transport large volumes of goods at reasonable costs.
rail.advantages3: Easily connect with other system operating programs for fast delivery.
rail.advantages4: High safety, minimizing the risk of damage or loss of goods
rail.benefit2: Increase the ability to plan accurately thanks to a stable schedule

air.title: Air Cargo
air.des: With deep experience and expertise in the field of air transport, Vietnam Post Logistics can meet the needs of fast and efficient freight transport for businesses, especially FDI enterprises.
air.item1: Fastest delivery speed, especially important when needing to expedite the shipping process.
air.item2: High safety of cargo transportation, especially suitable for fragile and perishable goods.
air.item3: Connecting trade with many countries around the world, creating conditions for international trade to develop strongly.
air.item5: Minimize loss or misplacement of goods, ensure integrity and timely delivery of orders.

trucking.title: Global Logistics
trucking.item3: High quality fleet of vehicles with professional staff.
trucking.second-sub-title-des:
• Import-export businesses
  • International e-commerce companies
  • Logistics service providers need integrated solutions
trucking.sub-des:
Cross-border trucking supports businesses by enabling them to transport goods by road quickly and with significantly lower costs compared to air and sea freight. As a result, cross-border trucking is currently experiencing strong growth and is favored over other transportation modes.
During truck transportation, businesses can easily track and monitor the location and status of goods through GPS positioning systems and other tracking technologies. This enhances transparency, safety, and minimizes the risk of loss or damage to goods.
Cross-border trucking accelerates the goods trading process, strongly boosting the commercial economies of developing countries.
trucking.advantages2: The process of trading goods takes place more quickly, strongly promoting the commercial economy of developing countries.
trucking.advantages3: Security and safety are always our top priority.

in-log.title: Global Logistics
in-log.des: Fastest shipping speed and best price on the market
in-log.second-text: Vietnam Post Logistics is providing prestigious and quality international express delivery solutions and connecting customers to 230 countries and territories around the world.
in-log.text-des: We provide fast, safe and flexible international express delivery solutions for specialized goods such as: Letters, samples, documents, gifts,…
in-log.speed: Fastest shipping speed on the market
in-log.item1-des: Vietnam Post Logistics is committed to providing the most competitive prices in the market, helping your business save maximum shipping costs.
in-log.item2-des: Support customs declaration and optimal tax policy.
in-log.why-item1-des: The only joint venture partner with DHL Express in Vietnam since 2007.
in-log.why-item2-des: Top international shipping market share for over 15 years.
in-log.why-item3-des: Authorized to deploy express delivery service with DDP terms, pay taxes on behalf of customers.
in-log.why-item4-des: Committed to quality and accompanying customers 24/7.

about-us.title: Vietnam Post Logistics
about-us.content: Vietnam Post Logistics is a member unit of Vietnam Post Corporation - the leading prestigious brand in Vietnam. We provide diverse. comprehensive and optimal logistics solutions for customers from domestic to international.
about-us.intro: Vietnam Post Logistics has been effectively fulfilling its role in transportation, operating the supply chain, and connecting trade between Vietnam and the world, contributing significantly to the country's economic development.
about-us.second-intro: At the same time, thanks to outstanding achievements and relentless efforts, Vietnam Post Logistics has affirmed its position by becoming the official partner of many major enterprises such as USPS, DHL, Korean Air, Vietnam Airlines, Vietjet Air, Cargolux, and is an official member of many large logistics associations worldwide, such as JCtrans and WCA.

warehouse.total-cargo: Tons of cargo handled per day
warehouse.item-3: A specialized design supply model suitable for each business.
warehouse.item-4: Safety and security are our top priorities.

sea-freight.title: Global Logistics
sea-freight.item4: Information security and safety are always top priorities.
sea-freight.main-des:
With the increasing demand for international ship-ping and the transport of oversized and overweight goods from the market, Vietnam Post Logistics’ cross-border sea freight service offers an effective solution, significantly helping customers optimize costs and increase profits.
Vietnam Post Logistics provides professional, cost-effective sea freight solutions with no limits on size or quantity of goods.
sea-freight.title-des1: The perfect solution for transporting all types of special goods.
sea-freight.title-des2: Cost optimization helps increase business profits in the best way.
sea-freight.title-des5: Security and safety are always our top priority.
